channel.title: [317]need help with saying owner has logged in
channel.description: how to make it say owner has logged in since my name is xx pkpure xx when i log in i want it to say owner xx pkpure xx has logged in and i want it to say same for other staff and i want them all in dif colors and i wanna know where to put them and how thank you for ur help

item.title: [317]need help with saying owner has logged in
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Under “public void initialize() {”

Add this:

switch(playerRights) { case 3: yell("Owner/Co-Owner " + playerName + " has logged in."); break; case 2: yell("Admin " + playerName + " has logged in."); break; case 1: yell("Mod " + playerName + " has logged in."); break; }

Read full topic
item.source: [317]need help with saying owner has logged in

item.title: [317]need help with saying owner has logged in
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

Well, I’m not sure if this works for all 317’s, but if your using delta - this is what mine looks like…

case 3: yell("The mighty owner of ServerName -" +playerName+ "- has logged in!"); } switch(playerRights) { case 2: yell("Admin -"+playerName+"- has logged in!"); } switch(playerRights) { case 1: yell("Mod -"+playerName+"- has logged in!"); }

I can’t tell you a huge lot on the subject of whether or not this will work as it is, but this can push you in the right direction.

Hope this helps!

-Hawk

Read full topic
